idea:
AllReal lets you create realistic, a 3D tour, and a professional listing website, using nothing more than your smartphone. 


AllReal uses technology of Lidar and photogrammetry to capture depth and texture of the infrastructure around you, weblinks/websites are cross compatible can work on all available platforms.


Production demo: https://allrealdemo.vercel.app

(The visualization was done for interior designer; to remodel a 1 floor house)


Research demo(Indevelop): https://allreal-pvt.vercel.app/

(Experimental v2 for allreal)


(Somewhere between validation and early traction)
name: AllReal Immersive

Our Vision: To be the best and the most reliable training company in India by 2025.

idea:
Mumbai चाय  has been proudly serving its customers in & around Mumbai area. 


Our mission has been to provide every Indian his favourite cup of Chai prepared in very hygienic conditions with high quality ingredients at an affordable price. 


Everyone enjoys his cup of Chai with finger food that goes well alongwith Chai. We also serve a limited menu comprising of customised finger food to compliment our Chai.


Besides our special Chai, our beverage menu also comprises coffee, Green Tea, Black Tea, Ice Tea, Cold Coffee, Chaas.
name: WAAH CHAI PRIVATE LIMITED
